info.title: Expose Data DIV - Movement Indications Service
info.description: This service allows querying the indications about new or modified registered data at the DIV on a daily basis. It concerns indications of the DIV related datadomains registration and vehicle.

get.summary: Query movement indications on new registrations.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: A security token.

parameters.name: Organisation
parameters.description: This header contains the identification of the organisation technically sending the request to SPF Mobility&Transport. It is the official 10-digit company number as known in the official company register.

parameters.name: Target-Organisation
parameters.description: This header contains the identification of the organisation for which the information is intended, from which the information is coming or which is business-wise responsible. It is the official 10-digit company number as known in the official company register.

parameters.name: Target-Organisation-Description
parameters.description: This header contains the description of the target-organisation.

parameters.name: User-Organisation
parameters.description: This header contains the identification of the organisation of the user.

parameters.name: User-Organisation-Description
parameters.description: This header contains the description of the organisation of the user.

parameters.name: Application
parameters.description: This is a description of the requesting business application. This description will be agreed and predefined by SPF Mobility&Transports and is based on the business authorisation to the target-organisation.

parameters.name: User-Id
parameters.description: This header needs to assure to be able to identify the person who is executing the request. This identification needs to be done by the users own organisation, but not necessarily by the SPF Mobility&Transport. This header is kept in the logs and when necessary (for example in case of a legal investigation) the organisation needs to be able to identify the user. In case the request is not initiated by an individual user, then an identifiable name should be entered identifying the automated process or the business unit.

parameters.name: User-Reference
parameters.description: This header contains a reference assigned by the user.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: This header specifies the language in which multi valued properties of the response should be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which the indications are requested.

parameters.name: vehicleCategory
parameters.description: Allows to filter a specific vehicle category. Filtering only allowed on M1 and M2.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Indicates the size of a page in a paginated collection resource.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Indicates the element before the first element of the requested page in a cursor-based paginated collection resource.

404.description: No data found for the requested parameters.

parameters.description: The date for which the indications are requested.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Indicates the size of a page in a paginated collection resource.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Indicates the element before the first element of the requested page in a cursor-based paginated collection resource.

get.summary: Query movement indications on changed data preregistered vehicles.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: A security token.

parameters.name: Organisation
parameters.description: This header contains the identification of the organisation technically sending the request to SPF Mobility&Transport. It is the official 10-digit company number as known in the official company register.

parameters.name: Target-Organisation
parameters.description: This header contains the identification of the organisation for which the information is intended, from which the information is coming or which is business-wise responsible. It is the official 10-digit company number as known in the official company register.

parameters.name: Target-Organisation-Description
parameters.description: This header contains the description of the target-organisation.

parameters.name: User-Organisation
parameters.description: This header contains the identification of the organisation of the user.

parameters.name: User-Organisation-Description
parameters.description: This header contains the description of the organisation of the user.

parameters.name: Application
parameters.description: This is a description of the requesting business application. This description will be agreed and predefined by SPF Mobility&Transports and is based on the business authorisation to the target-organisation.

parameters.name: User-Id
parameters.description: This header needs to assure to be able to identify the person who is executing the request. This identification needs to be done by the users own organisation, but not necessarily by the SPF Mobility&Transport. This header is kept in the logs and when necessary (for example in case of a legal investigation) the organisation needs to be able to identify the user. In case the request is not initiated by an individual user, then an identifiable name should be entered identifying the automated process or the business unit.

parameters.name: User-Reference
parameters.description: This header contains a reference assigned by the user.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: This header specifies the language in which multi valued properties of the response should be returned.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which the indications are requested.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Indicates the size of a page in a paginated collection resource.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Indicates the element before the first element of the requested page in a cursor-based paginated collection resource.

404.description: No data found for the requested parameters.

404.description: No data found for the requested parameters.

items.description: An array of movement indication objects. The content can be none, one or multiple objects.

total.description: The total amount of elements in the collection resource following the requested parameters.

dateTime.description: The timestamp of the movement indication

transactionTypeCode.description: The type code of the transaction.

objectKey.description:
The object containing the object key reference values.
An attribute key reference value only is available following the business legal purposes.

plateUID.description: The license plate related technical unique identifier.

unifier.description: The unifier of the vehicle identification number. Always used in combination with the VIN.

transactionUID.description: The transaction related technical unique identifier. Can only be available when the movement indication is related to a registration.

instance.description: A UUID that identifies this specific occurence of the problem.

title.description: A short summary of the problem.

status.description: The HTTP status code as originally returned by the service.

detail.description: An more detailed explanation specific to this occurence of the problem.
